author: COLLEEN LONG, MICHAEL BALSAMO and ZEKE MILLER
title: Biden to nominate Ketanji Brown Jackson for Supreme Court
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — President Joe Biden on Friday will nominate federal appeals court Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson to the Supreme Court, the White House said, making her the first Black woman selected to serve on a court that once declared her race unworthy of c…
